snippet: A winery owner chased an investor through a Northern California vineyard and shot him in the head as the police approached, the authorities said Tuesday.
abstract: Robert Dahl, owner of Dahl Vineyards in Northern California, chases investigator and business partner Emad Tawfilis through vineyard in SUV, fatally shooting Tawfilis just as police arrive before leading police on short chase and killing himself; partners had sued each other over $1.2 million investment.
lead_paragraph: A winery owner chased an investor through a Northern California vineyard and shot him in the head as the police approached, the authorities said Tuesday.
